smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (newText.isBlank() && hideWhenBlank) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: newText.isBlank() && hideWhenBlank
Parentheses in (10 * 60 * 1000L) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: 10 * 60 * 1000L
Parentheses in (findPreference(PreferencesManager.SETTINGS_VERSION_PREFERENCE_KEY)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: findPreference(PreferencesManager.SETTINGS_VERSION_PREFERENCE_KEY)

Parentheses in (pushManager?.areDeviceNotificationsAllowed()
                ?: true) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: pushManager?.areDeviceNotificationsAllowed()
                ?: true
Parentheses in (it.status == TroubleshootTest.TestStatus.SUCCESS) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: it.status == TroubleshootTest.TestStatus.SUCCESS
Parentheses in (status == TestStatus.FAILED || status == TestStatus.SUCCESS) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: status == TestStatus.FAILED || status == TestStatus.SUCCESS

Parentheses in ("Status of [$permission] : " +
                    if (PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED == ContextCompat.checkSelfPermission(context, permission))
                        "PERMISSION_GRANTED"
                    else
                        "PERMISSION_DENIED") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: "Status of [$permission] : " +
                    if (PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED == ContextCompat.checkSelfPermission(context, permission))
                        "PERMISSION_GRANTED"
                    else
                        "PERMISSION_DENIED"
Parentheses in (keyStore.getEntry(alias, null) as? KeyStore.PrivateKeyEntry) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: keyStore.getEntry(alias, null) as? KeyStore.PrivateKeyEntry
Parentheses in (keyStore.getEntry(alias, null) as KeyStore.PrivateKeyEntry) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: keyStore.getEntry(alias, null) as KeyStore.PrivateKeyEntry
Parentheses in (findViewById<View>(R.id.search_edit_frame)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: findViewById<View>(R.id.search_edit_frame)
Parentheses in (findViewById<View>(R.id.search_mag_icon)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: findViewById<View>(R.id.search_mag_icon)
Parentheses in (iconViewParent as LinearLayout) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: iconViewParent as LinearLayout
Parentheses in (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.O) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.O
